00036 #include "PACC/Socket/UDPServer.hpp"
00037 #include <iostream>
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 using namespace PACC;
00041 
00043 void Socket::UDPServer::acceptDatagrams()
00044 {
00045     bool lHalt = false;
00046     mHalt = false;
00047     while(!lHalt && !mHalt)
00048     {
00049         try {
00050             string lDatagram;
00051             Address lPeer;
00052             receiveDatagram(lDatagram, lPeer);
00053             lHalt = main(lDatagram, lPeer);
00054         } catch(const Exception& inError) {
00055             // report any error and ignore
00056             cerr << inError.getMessage() << endl;
00057         }
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00073 void Socket::UDPServer::setDefaultOptions()
00074 {
00075     setSockOpt(eReuseAddress, true);
00076     setSockOpt(eRecvBufSize, 65535);
00077     setSockOpt(eSendBufSize, 1024);
00078     setSockOpt(eRecvTimeOut, 10);
00079     setSockOpt(eSendTimeOut, 10);
00080 }
